title: Oil spills - worldwide
summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has the highest Amount of leaked oil (in tons) and Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has the lowest Amount of leaked oil (in tons).
The difference of Amount of leaked oil (in tons) between the highest and lowest Oil Spill Event is 980000.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is appeared to be the highest at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and lowest at Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has the highest Amount of leaked oil (in tons) and Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has the lowest Amount of leaked oil (in tons).
The difference of Amount of leaked oil (in tons) between the highest and lowest Oil Spill Event is 980000.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is highest at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and lowest at Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
There is a difference of 980000.0 between the maximum Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and minimum Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).

The Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has the highest Amount of leaked oil (in tons), followed by Gulf War (Persian Gulf 1991 oil platform), and Amoco Cadiz (Atlantic 1978 tanker). Down to the Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) which is the lowest.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig), and Gulf War (Persian Gulf 1991 oil platform) have a similar Amount of leaked oil (in tons) that is 1000000.0.
The average Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in all 12 Oil Spill Events is 254916.67.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is 3059000.0 if we add up values of all Oil Spill Events.

data.Oil Spill Event: Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig)
